sqlGroup.name: templateFolder
sqlGroup.sql: SELECT CONCAT('D-',CONVERT(SID,CHAR)) SID, C_NAME, CONCAT('D-',CONVERT(R_SID,CHAR)) R_SID FROM SSM_STDTMP_FOLDER WHERE R_TEMPLATE = ? UNION ALL SELECT CONCAT('F-',CONVERT(SID,CHAR)) SID, C_NAME, CONCAT('D-',CONVERT(R_SID,CHAR)) R_SID FROM SSM_STDTMP_FILE WHERE R_SID IN ( SELECT SID FROM SSM_STDTMP_FOLDER WHERE R_TEMPLATE = ? )
